autocomplete.title: Autocomplete
autocomplete.description: Sets the autocomplete method to use when the combobox receives user input

disabled.title: Disabled
disabled.description: Sets the disabled state of the combobox

name.title: Name
name.description: This element's value will be surfaced during form submission under the provided name

position.title: Position
position.description: Controls the placement of the combobox dropdown

placeholder.title: Placeholder
placeholder.description: Sets the placeholder value of the combobox to provide a hint to the user

value.title: Value
value.description: The initial value of the combobox

Slot.title: Default slot
Slot.description: Supports fast-option, option elements, or elements with a role of option

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax

SlotControl.title: Input Control slot
SlotControl.description: Slot to replace the contents of the control container

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax

SlotIndicator.title: Indicator slot
SlotIndicator.description: Slot to provide a custom icon to represent the visual indicator

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax

SlotStart.title: Start slot
SlotStart.description: Contents of the start slot are positioned before the contents of the control container

id.title: The ID of the data corresponding to a dictionary key

dataLocation.title: The location of the data using lodash path syntax

SlotEnd.title: End slot
SlotEnd.description: Contents of the end slot are positioned after the contents of the control container
